Sentencas: A new production technique consisting mainly of a combination of tape casting and isostatic pressing to fabricate microtubular supports for solid oxide fuel cells is presented in this study.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For this purpose, thin anode support layer is obtained by tape casting.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The tape is then wrapped around a rod and subjected to isostatic pressing.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The anode support microtube laminate is sintered after the removal of the rod.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructural observations show that the anode support with the suggested method is free of delamination and structural defect.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similar microtubular supports are also fabricated by conventional extrusion to compare the mechanical performance.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three point bending test results indicate that the anode supports with the suggested method provide higher mechanical strength due to improved compaction by isostatic pressing.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, similar micro tubular cells are constructed on both anode supports for the electrochemical considerations.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results reveal that the cell, whose anode support is manufactured via tape casting and isostatic pressing, provides a reasonable electrochemical performance although no optimization is carried out in the fabrication steps.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, the method recommended in this study is found to be an appropriate method for the fabrication of tubular/microtubular supports in solid oxide fuel cells or in similar areas.
Titulo: Tape casting coupled with isostatic pressing as an alternative fabrication method for microtubular solid oxide fuel cells
